title: Eyebrows permanent makeup
description: "Individual hair" technique: realistically-looking hairs are drawn one by one. Allows to adjust the shape of the eyebrows, make the eyebrows visually thicker and more expressive. "Powder spraying" technique involves the use of several shades: dots of different pigment are applied. Shades are chosen based on the clientâ€™s natural appearance leading to the natural and delicate results. Either of the two techniques can be applied individually, or the two can be combined.
